items.title: Concrete Sealers Market worth $2.95 billion by 2030, at 6.4%, says MarketsandMarketsâ„¢
items.author: Marketsandmarkets
items.description: The global Concrete Sealers Market is expected to grow from $2.03 billion in 2024 to $2.95 billion by 2030, at a CAGR of 6.4%, driven by advancements in sealer technology, including nanotechnology and eco-friendly formulations.
